trends: There have been 72 other sightings in Nashville
There were no other sightings in Nashville on or around October 27th 2010
divs: sighting detailsi take the dog out every morning before work. i generally look at the sky to see if it is cloudy, etc. this morning when i looked up, i immediately saw 2 lights, at first i thought they were jets, heading west\southwest in a parallel formation. after watching, i saw many others, all headed the same direction. i thought that to be odd due to the fact that most jets don't normally fly in the same flight path. i tried counting them and stopped at around 25 lights. there was no noise, there were a few clouds that i could see. i did not loose site of these objects, i just took the dog back in and got ready for work. surely ft. campbell ( ky) or the nashville airport would have picked this up on radar i thought. i don't believe i have ever seen this sort of thing in my entire life.
Summary: Over 25 bright lights, all moving in a westward direction.
